name: Terraria-Like prototype
description:
"Terraria-Like prototype" is my first approach to a survival game with procedural generated worlds and resources, the prototype's mechanics are heavily inspired in terraria.

Features
  • Different resources.
  • Different tools, each one for a resource type.
  • Procedurally generated world.
  • Procedurally generated caves.
  • Procedurally generated and configurable biomes.
  • Procedurally generated resources.
  • Three types of biomes, sky biome, top biome and underground biome.
  • Fully optimized dynamic tile rendering system that allows huge maps.
  • Inventory system with drag and drop (with some bugs).
  • Resource gathering.
  • Placing and removing blocks.
Additional information

More things will be added on the future in order to improve the current game and test new mechanics that I would like to introduce, such as specific tiles with gravity (sand), and crafting and combat system.
